titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to establish and implement a process under which members of the public may view the proceedings of the House and the committees of the House online.

Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to establish and implement a process under which members of the public may view the proceedings of the House and the committees of the House online.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Requires the Clerk of the House of Representatives to establish and implement a process under which members of the public may view the proceedings of the House and of its committees online through House official public Internet sites.
